model.sm_drive¶

This module includes continuous-time models for a permmanent-magnet synchronous motor drive. The space-vector model is implemented in rotor coordinates.

Classes

Datalogger()

This class contains a datalogger.

Drive(motor, mech, converter, delay, pwm, …)

This class interconnects the subsystems of a PMSM drive and provides an interface to the solver.

Motor(mech[, R_s, L_d, L_q, psi_f, p])

This class represents a permanent-magnet synchronous motor.

motulator
